subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Rick Pitino improved his career record against Billy Donovan, his onetime star guard, to 7-0, as Louisville advanced to the Final Four in a come-from-behind victory over Florida.
snippet: Rick Pitino improved his career record against Billy Donovan, his onetime star guard, to 7-0, as Louisville advanced to the Final Four in a come-from-behind victory over Florida.
